Reviews.Title: “Good location, but.”
Reviews.Author: Karl S
Reviews.Content: When we arrived they had no record of our reservation despite us having a booking reference. No apology was offered for this but they gave us a "complimentary" upgrade from a standard room to a business suite. When we got to our room we found housekeeping had not finished making the bed as pillows were on the floor without pillow cases. This was rectified without fuss. There was also a large dirty ring around the outside of the toilet bowl. The suite was large and comfortable with a very large bathroom with separate bath and shower. Restaurant meals were pretty ordinary and the dinner buffet was not an option if you don't eat seafood. The breakfast buffet was a poor cousin to the breakfasts we had at European hotels a week previous. Staff at this hotel didn't fall over themselves to make you feel welcome. We felt the only thing this hotel had in it's favour was the location on Orchard Road. We would not stay there again and would not recommend it to our friends.

Reviews.Title: “Comfy and well located”
Reviews.Author: expectant customer
Reviews.Content: Room 630. 3 nights. Hotel right on Orchard Road, right on top of shops and restaurants, Check in OK, check out OK. Breakfast good with a wide choice. Coffee service can be a bit slow. Swimming pool area OK, not fantastic but adequate. Changing is a bit tricky, there are no lockers for residents so you have to take your clothes out to the pool with you. Room is a fair size, nice double bed, TV has a wide range of channels, tea and coffee facilities, iron and board in the room, bath and shower, safe. I had a quiet room but a colleague found some noise which disturbed him from construction work that went on to 9 30 pm.

Reviews.Title: “Good but not good enough”
Reviews.Author: dannyanb
Reviews.Content: As a business traveler I expect a lot from the staff and this is lacking at this hotel. Other than that the hotel is in a great spot on Orchard road, the rooms are comfortable, the pool is fine and the gym is excellent. Breakfast is a little on the thin side and the entrance by foot is via a shopping center.

Reviews.Title: “Return to the Concorde Hotel, Singapore”
Reviews.Author: G0_Eagles
Reviews.Content: This was our 2nd stay at the Concorde Hotel (1st in April 2009). The standard of our room and the quality of the buffet breakfasts were still high. The rooms are clean and quite spacious and still the most comfortable of beds. The staff were polite and helpful, we had free WIFI in the room and breakfast was included in our room charge. My only criticism would be the shopping mall on the lower floor of the building. It was rather gloomy, rundown and most uninviting, though I understand this is not a hotel management responsibility. Definitely an update needed here. We did see some 'ladies of the night' hanging around down there, we were not bothered by them but it was just a bit 'sleazy'. The hotel is less than a 5 minute walk to the Dhoby Ghaut MRT station which connects several of the lines. We used the MRT quite a bit this time - it was hassle-free, cheap and by far the easiest way to get around Singapore.Take a short ride to Chinatown, just a couple of stops and enjoy a large bottle of icy cold Tiger Beer for S$5.90. There are also plenty of bargains and places to eat too. A pleasant walk up Orchard Road takes you to more shopping malls and eateries than you can imagine. The Concorde is close enough for quick access to the shops but far enough away to be out of the huste and bustle. We visited Little India - a very interesting experience and Arab Street where you can buy the most beautiful fabrics - I have never seen such a variety of colours,patterns and types of fabric - if you like to make your own clothes don't miss Arab Street. There were also many shops selling scarves, clothes and some amazing carpets - most places will ship your carpet home for you. Must-dos include the Night Safari and Sentosa Island. We decided to spend the S$68 each for Universal Studios and enjoyed every minute - the Transformers ride is a must! Overall a wonderful holiday in Singapore

Reviews.Title: “Singapore Shopping and Jogging”
Reviews.Author: sonlake
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel with large rooms. They have recently introduced included wi-fi which was a deciding factor in our decision to stay here - it was however slow and not always reliable. The location was good, near the south end of Orchard Road, very close to Plaza Singapura, which provides a good cross section of Singapore shopping and many eating options. After being in Malaysia for two weeks, we particularly enjoyed Carl's Junior (bottomless soft drinks, which is rare in Singapore) and look forward to its arrival in Australia! The hotel is very close to Fort Channing, which includes a substantial park with nice walking paths. If visited early or late it is good for running with no effect from car fumes. From Fort Channing it is also a nice uninterrupted walk or run down a path beside the river to explore the Clarke Quay and Marina Bay areas. There was a free coach shuttle to Universal Studios available from the hotel but is for tourists only so you need to carry your passport - alternatively the taxi was SGD12 or less. One substantial negative to the hotel is the entry and exit points by foot - you need to go down below the lobby by either one or two levels and through what the hotel describes as a shopping mall to get out to Orchard Road. The mall area is tatty, grubby, deserted and smelly and not a pleasant experience - it would be far nice to be able to directly exit the lobby but the design of the hotel does not allow this. Some reviews say that some refurbishment has taken place but our (entry level) room, although nice, had not been refurbished and was quite dated. We had a new flat screen TV with quite a few channels but reception was poor compared to the digital quality to which we are accustomed. As well as the standard international news and local channels, four mainly movie channels were provided but the movies were mostly by no means new releases. The room had a good desk area. The room's window overlooked a very large park-like area which has a high fence and warning signs involving guards with guns prohibiting access - we found out that it is a Presidential Palace, which opens to the public occasionally. The room had good sound proofing and double glazed windows and very effective air conditioning. The people at reception were fine but we were given the standard 'up-sell' which I thought was unnecessary. The concierge Robert, was good in that he happily stored our cases before check in and after check out. I consider this hotel to be of good value and located very well.

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast was great!”
Reviews.Author: Rararaimu
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 1 night only, I got double bed. I stayed with 2 others. The room was clean, the size was average. The bell boy was so kind! And the breakfast was so good. So many choises. Outside the hotels you can find a foodcourt at night. I love the location too. Thank youuu

Reviews.Title: “FREE WIFI IN ROOM!”
Reviews.Author: bnzw111
Reviews.Content: Its very rare to find a hotel with free in-room high speed wifi, especially in expensive Singapore. That in itself was enough to warrant them an excellent rating from me. Other factors (room, location, service, cleanliness) are all quite good. However, i wish they would improve the selection of stores and restaurants (they have a mini mall on the 1st two floors). The staff can be a bit uptight (no warm smiles) but the service is still up to standard. Overall a great place to stay in if you want to live along Orchard road

Reviews.Title: “comfortable and friendly”
Reviews.Author: wildfleur74
Reviews.Content: We are returning customers, and always enjoy our stay here. The rooms are large and the ensuite is of a good size. The staff are very friendly and also very helpful and polite. The buffet breakfast is always excellent with a huge choice. The rooms are very clean, and the tea and coffee facility is good. If you run short of anything a quick call, and in no time replacements are brought along. We ordered a taxi to the airport which arrived in good time and cost no more than the airport taxis. The atrium is light and airy and very comfortable, with a pianist in the evenings. Hard to fault. The only comment we have is that the last five or six times we stayed here breakfast was included!!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: Geoff-Merril
Reviews.Content: Great hotel with quick easy registration, fantastic large rooms with all amentities. Good central location to walk to shops and food outlets for dining. Would definetly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location for Shopping”
Reviews.Author: mseera
Reviews.Content: Hotel is right on Orchard Road, where most of the shopping complex are located. There are 2 MRT stations close by, either Somerset or Dhoby Ghaut, depending on your destination. Reasonably priced food at the food court just next to the hotel. Breakfast provided by the hotel was good.

Reviews.Title: “good option on orchard”
Reviews.Author: gypsygirl_8
Reviews.Content: Stayed recently for 2 nights on route from Australia to paris and 1 night on return trip. Good location as 5 minute walk to Dhoby Ghaut metro station which will take you to Chinatown, Clarke quay ect. Also in walking distance to Canning park. Supermarket very close (3 minute walk) in centrepoint complex which has a good selection of food and wine (alcohol expensive in hotel). Many shopping opportunities near by along orchard road. Rooms spacious and refurbished with very comfortable bed and pillows. Free wifi in rooms and also 2 bottles of water in room complimentry and replenished daily. Service in hotel was friendly and attentive. Breakfast available from 6:30-10:30 so great for a sleep in. Not amazing food but fair options including egg station and i have to say service in breakfast area was excellent. Others have mentioned an arcade. It 'really' isn't a big deal.Literally 1 minute or less from orchard rd to hotel lobby via a fast lift. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Decent, But Not For Families”
Reviews.Author: jingga18
Reviews.Content: This is a recently-refurbished hotel. The external condition of the hotel feels old and tired. But once I get to the room, I can immediately see that it has just been refurbished. The room is spacious, the bathroom is very big. The location of this hotel is excellent, with lots of cafes and restaurants downstairs. Only a short stroll to the epicenter of Orchard Rd (where all the major shopping malls are). The lobby is situated on 3rd floor. On the 1st and 2nd floor, there is a middle-class shopping centre, not comparable to the likes of Ngee Ann City, Paragon, Ion, etc. But, it could be a good change from all the overpriced, out-of-range designer goods and give tourists opportunity to shop for affordable souvenirs. There is something that I need to bring up which is the downside of this hotel. I suspect there are a number of night clubs in the shopping centre right below the property. At night, I wanted to walk around and get a light dinner. I was quite taken by surprise to see a few ladies dressed promicuously waiting around the elevators at Level 1. All in all the room itself is decent, good value for money (for Singapore's Orchard Rd), But I would not suggest this hotel for families with young kids, strictly due to the night activities downstairs.

Reviews.Title: “Decent for the price in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Kali737
Reviews.Content: Concorde is in a nice location and decent value for money in Singapore. The first room I had was a real disappointment, almost not natural light at all and not a great layout. The first thing I did after getting to the room was call and ask if I could be moved. They were full that day so couldn't move me but did the next day to a much nicer room. The hotel is on top of a small mall filled with lots of hairdresser's and girlie bars but also a tiny convenience story which was handy for drinks and snacks. It was in no way intimidating despite the girlie bars and you can easily avoid go through the mall by taking a different entrance in. There's also a supermarket a few minutes away and a food court downstairs. The pool area was pretty shabby, not inviting. The gym had also seen better days but I liked it as it was well equipped with things not normally found in hotels such as medicine balls and kettle weights as well as a range of free weights. It's a short walk to the MRT so all in all a good choice and I'd stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Only one small oversight”
Reviews.Author: ExRAAFie
Reviews.Content: I must admit I was not happy on the first night in the hotel. To qualify, I had just spent the day flying from Adelaide SA, to Melbourne VIC, and then a seven and a half hour direct flight to Singapore arriving just before midnight, Singapore time. Add to this some fairly serious medications (prescribed) and I think I was looking for something/someone to criticise. Well I found it. That "something" was the state of the room and the lack of attention to cleanliness - or so I thought! The next morning after a good night's sleep and a more thorough inspection of the room I realised the room wasn't too bad at all. Everything was clean - except the old stains on the carpet which really weren't that bad. Everything else was fine and dandy - clean crockery (ie two coffee cups and six water tumblers), cutlery (ie tea spoon), bathroom and bedroom/sitting room. The Concorde does not have any rooms with balconies. Although our room faced onto the always busy Orchard Road we did not have any traffic noise issues thanks to the double glazing on the rather large window. Don't know about you but I rather like watching humanity pass me by in the plethora of vehicles available to the Singaporeans. The food available in "Spices" (third floor of the hotel) was very acceptable. Breakfast was provided daily between 6:00 am to 10:30 am and catered for most nationalities' idiosyncratic tastes. I say most - don't expect Vegemite to be seen anywhere at any of the sittings. We tried out their dinner special of seafood platter with lobster for SD$45 ++. The seafood was superb. My only criticism is the lobster meat, or lack thereof. The portion was so small. Two small mouthfus and it was gone. Also, chef could have been less heavy handed with the bread crumbs on the lobster. Now for the reason I did not give this rating a straight five. I had noticed that when we had our ritualistic cup of morning coffee and put the empty coffee cups on the bathroom bench the cups would attract minute ants - and lots of them - to the bench and used coffee cups. In order to stop this home invasion each morning I developed a strategy whereby I would rinse out the cups after each use and place them upside down on a clean, dry face washing towel. Please note no detergent was provided in the apartment for the purpose of household cleaning. The strategy worked and I patted myself on the back. On returning to the room after a stroll one morning the cleaning staff had been through the room and achieving their usual high standard of cleanliness - or so I thought. There, still in the same positions as I had left them were the used and still stained coffee cups. The staff had completely overlooked the fact that the cups needed cleaning with detergent. Alas, that was not all that had been overlooked. He/she had not bothered to return one of the pillows to the bed. The pillow had been left on the floor to contemplate its own navel. Obviously a hurried phone call was made to Room Service. Within a couple of minutes the Room Service Manager, none the less, was standing at the door enquiring as to the nature of my complaint. I showed him the stained coffee cups and the depressed looking pillow. He informed me that a cleaner would be despatched to our room to conduct a full cleaning regimen. This was duly accomplished in a precise and detailed manner. Apart from the aforementioned lack of concentration regarding cleaning of the coffee cups, my family and I have agreed that should we ever find ourselves in Singapore in the future we would like to stay at the Concorde Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Surprise”
Reviews.Author: chopeta
Reviews.Content: Don't be deceived, from outside the hotel looks ordinary & un-appealing maybe due to the stores at the hote's basement. Upon reaching the lobby, it's actually a very decent, nice & I would say posh hotel. The receptionist was friendly, had an upgrade & early check in. Also gave me a late check out. I like the hote's structure, the hallway is wide & overlooking the lobby. Sunlight will brighten up the lobby, felt cozy. As it's situated along orchard road, it's very convenient to the malls around, eating areas & transportation. Just infront is a bus stop & few mins walk to two mrt stations. The bed is very comfortable, we had a room balcony but it wasn't as nice. The usual stuff is inside the room. Highly recommended :)

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Popsylu
Reviews.Content: I spent 6 nights at this hotel with my daughter in January. Although the hotel is obviously old, it has had some recent refurbishments. Our room was clean and well appointed. Breakfast was good, so much selection! Hotel was located centrally on Orchard Rd with great shopping in every direction! Staff were attentive and the porters/ doormen were particularly helpful. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “NICE HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Hollbez
Reviews.Content: The Concorde is a very nice Hotel. Very clean and a lovely room but we had asked for Deluxe but was quite disappointed. We found we had a locked door in the room which led to an adjoing room - could hear the people in the next room quite a bit. They had a child also which was a bit of a nuisance when they came in late in the evening, I don't know whether they realised that we could hear them through the door. Luckily it did not spoil our trip but for a Deluxe room it wasn't what I expected.

Reviews.Title: “Good accommodation, good location”
Reviews.Author: Mark1002
Reviews.Content: Wife & I had a two night stop-over en-route to Auckland. Our 'basic' room was spacious and clean. Reception staff helpful, quick and cheerful. Swimming pool was a treat and the attendant on hand immediately to make sure we were OK. Do not be put off by the shopping mall in the lower levels. We did not eat in the hotel, but found the outdoor eatery at the end of the building lots of fun and very cheap.

Reviews.Title: “Old But Great”
Reviews.Author: 196A
Reviews.Content: Spent one night there. The location is great, on orchard rd where shopping center are located. The room was great though it was quite old. The bed was very comfortable to sleep on after a long day walk around the orchard. The international menu also served in a wide range of variety, with good taste. The only bad thing i found was the old room with old furniture. It was grand in its time which i believe had passed. Some touch-up should make the hotel better. But again, even it was old i found myself comfortable to stay there.

Reviews.Title: “overall a good hotel”
Reviews.Author: thelonetraveller
Reviews.Content: this hotel is great, but its front office staff aint that helpful, i reached at about 10.30 am, but wasnt allowed to checkin until 12 pm. which was quite dissapointing. i waited in the lobby for a while n then finally got drenched in unexpected rainful of singapore (singapour?) hahahahaha. the hotel is located at the farther end of orchard road, and its enterance is thru an ancient shopping mall. but once you cross that and reach its lift , the dramatic tranformation sweeps over. rooms are spacious, welll decorated, clean and overall pleasant, even the pool os nice. good place to stay if you get a good discount, like i did.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location but that's all”
Reviews.Author: B L
Reviews.Content: Located at the end of Orchard Road (nearest MRT station is Somerset) makes it a very convenient location for tourists. There's shops/supermarkets/restaurants around all within walking distance. The hotel itself is however very much dated and in clear needs of a renovation. There's stains in the bathroom and you wont wanna stay at the bathroom for too long. The bed is ok but can be much better. Personally I think it doesnt really worth the price you pay for. I would rather go for a new hotel even if the location is not that convenient. It's Singapore that we are talking about....places cant to be far anyway. and the transportation system is real good so you dont really need a hotel right in the city centre.

Reviews.Title: “Ordinary hotel but good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Jashnzindagi
Reviews.Content: This hotel's plus point is its location on orchard road. But I think most hotels are in good locations anyways as everything is easily reachable in spore. Access to the hotel is cumbersome if you take a walk from the MRT. I did that with my luggage and got nearly lost getting to the hotel. You might end up walking up few stairs to reach the reception. Staff is friendly. Rooms were good in size, though some furnishings looked old. The price was good for a busy week for hotels so for me, it was good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location on Orchard”
Reviews.Author: keluargaku
Reviews.Content: Amid other hotels on Orchard, this is a 4-star hotel offering a relatively lower price, without sacrifying the value of your stay. It's between OG and Plaza Singapura. Rooms, breakfast and service are standard. (they served a very good muesli during my stay). What I love most is the super comfortable bed (usually get insomnia while travelling, but not in this hotel) Some other reviewers complaining about hotel's entrance from an 'old shopping centre', it's true, it's factual, but if you don't want to go through that shopping centre, you can always go out/in from its main entrance. And if it's OK for you to go to the old shopping centre, there're food stalls on the basement, you can try some local food for SDG 5. To me the only minus point is the elevator, I found it not working twice, and had to seek help from an employee.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel - in great location”
Reviews.Author: Elygalaxy
Reviews.Content: The hotel location couldn't really get much better (unless you want to be in the marina area). It's central to most areas in the city with plenty of things to do. My room was ok - nothing special and maybe a little dated but very dark. I was on the top floor with what should have been a street view (for what it would have been) - but it was obscured by a great concrete block as part of the hotel construction. Fortunately, as I was only staying one night it didn't matter too much. The room was clean the facilities fine but the aircon was noisy on low and high level - so settled for medium setting. For this class of hotel - wi-fi and internet should be free - but it isn't. Expect to pay up to £10 per day extra for this. The main restaurant off the lobby serves up an excellent breakfast with very friendly and helpful staff (which is the same throughout the hotel). The pool area looks great and the gym looks ok. Getting about is ok - you can normally get a taxi from outside the lobby and all the local transport system works really well and efficiently. For such a short stay - there wasn't much time to find places to go and see - but I would recommend (on a fair weather day or evening) a trip to the top of the Sands Hotel down at the marina for some stunning views.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with Great Location”
Reviews.Author: saribali
Reviews.Content: Great hotel...good location, only few steps away from MRT, great services and meal..the rooms are perfect, view to main street. But the housekeeping information need to update, because I have to asked extra towel everyday (4 people in the room) and hotel only give us 3 sets. Only the shops (adult shops) below hotel archade are not suitable for children's eyes.

Reviews.Title: “The only attraction one can think of in the hotel is it's location”
Reviews.Author: guatamssgi
Reviews.Content: I checked into the hotel on 15-1-2012 for two nights. The rooms though clean are old small thinks like shoeshine are no placed in the room. I ordered a indian dish which was to be accompanied with indian curd , pickles , salads etc but it was not food is just about ok . The staff is friendly but I suppose it is helpless. Except the location I would not advise anyone to stay in the hotel. It is quite expensive comparing to it's services and facilities. There are a no of hotels around this hotel are are better I stayed in this hotel because of the very high marketing they have been doing. But it was a dreadful experience.

Reviews.Title: “good location, little old”
Reviews.Author: Leonardo B
Reviews.Content: the room was ok, we were upgraded to club for a little extra, so we could have a breakfast in a relaxing place. Club lounge poor in food and variety. All the hotel, specially the facade, need to be refurnished. Also the swimming pool area need to get some works: the floor is slippery Overall is ok, staff was friendly and helpful. free bus to sentosa in the back

Reviews.Title: “Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: 91KateVB
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel becuase we wanted a good value hotel on Orchard Rd and this didn't dissapoint! Very good value for money. Buffet breakfast had a great variety. Room was clean, complimentary newspaper daily. Pool area nice but not so large. Staff all very friendly. Would highly recommend to other travellers, especially someone not wanting to brak the budget but at the same time staying in a nice hotel in a great location.

Reviews.Title: “6 star premium location hotel”
Reviews.Author: dmr064
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Premium Club which is on the 9th floor. Rooms were lavish and large. Staff was very attentive and always happy and friendly. The premium club was well worth the money spent with private breakfast facilities and complimentary drinks and snacks every night. Fast private checkin and checkout for premium club stayers. Location was excellent with sightseeing buses almost at our door step. We were located above the reception area so anyone wanting to sleep early should request a room away from the reception area. The noise did stop around 10.30pm which suited us.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location, some staff better than others”
Reviews.Author: FinLondon
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Concorde for business for 5 days in December. The location is great right on Orchard Rd, a short walk to the art museums and right by a bus stop with busses going all over the city. The hotel is what you would expect for this class of hotel in terms of decor, the bedrooms were well furnished and very spacious. It was very convenient to have a taxi rank outside. The breakfast was very good, lots of choice, although the range of fresh fruit could be improved. The only gripe was that on check in, the reception staff wanted us to give credit cards to cover the bill, although we were not paying for the room ourselves, the organisation that we were working for was. One of their employees had made our reservations and had already checked in and there was a note on the booking that all charges should be made to her. It took ages to sort this out, but once it was sorted out check in was very straightforward. Apart from this, the service at the hotel was very good. There is a small outdoor pool in the hotel and a well equiped gym which is great. Downstairs there are lots of places for reflexology or massage and it was great to pop down for a quick massage before dinner. The location was close to some great, relaxed restaurants and department stores for shopping. I would like to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “convenient location”
Reviews.Author: aster_palms
Reviews.Content: We arrived in the middle of the night but check in was pretty quick. Stayed three nights. Buffet breakfast was above average. Very good service from friendly staff. Check out was pretty much the same time. Shopping all within two minutes walk away. An absolutely convenient location for anyone wanting to explore Orchard Road with underground metros all very close by. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, fair service but needs upgrading”
Reviews.Author: pddThailand
Reviews.Content: Hotel is OK. Service OK good check in efficient and got an upgrade which was value. (Free internet and access to Club lounge) Rooms are a little outdated and bathrooms are poor, shower was not working properly. Breakfast OK

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel To Stay In.”
Reviews.Author: rsk888
Reviews.Content: Very nice Hotel To Stay In Singapore. Located On Orchard Road (In Front Grand Central Hotel Building), Close to shopping Center, You can find Food on Food Court on the Ground Level or In Front of Grand Central Hotel. Very Close to walk to Somerset MRT and Orchard Central.

Reviews.Title: “Decent stay for the price, great location!”
Reviews.Author: Arch-Designer
Reviews.Content: My first stay at Concorde Singapore in Nov 2011 (former Le Meridien). The hotel does not have a prominent entrance facing Orchard Road. If you are not arriving by car/taxi, you have to take one of the hotel elevators to get up from the street level (from and into the lobby). You find yourself in a semi dingy food court below upon entering from the back street. Is it the most attractive hotel entrance on Orchard? Absolutely NOT! Is it that bad? Think of it as an interesting experience. The room itself was just fine; it was large enough for a couple, clean bathroom, friendly staff and decent overall public area appearance. Location is very convenient still for those of you who'd like to explore Orchard shopping area. Walking distance to Paragon and Takashimaya. There are other hotels located toward the 'center' of Orchard Rd but unfortunately most were fully booked on the days of my visit. Unless they offer more competitive pricing, I am reluctant to book another hotel room at Concorde. Based on my many trips to Singapore previosuly, you can get better deals on Orchard with better amenities and shorter walk to attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Concorde - Good experience in SIngapore”
Reviews.Author: MinalC
Reviews.Content: Hotel Concorde provides good accomodation. Singapore in itself is a very good location for short holidays like 2-3 days. Especially if you want to enjoy with shopping then Singapore is one of the best locations. From that perspective Concorde offers good accomodation facilities. Also being near to Mustafa Centre and Little India it was easy going and fun being there. Rooms are awsome and good part was easy access to food court especially when we were hungry when reached there. Since the bus stop is just opposite and Mustafa Centre is near by we enjoyed staying at Concorde. This was especially useful when we had to carry shopping items purchased at Mustafa. I must say our stay in Singapore was fun due to enjoyable stay at Concorde.

Reviews.Title: “Good stay!”
Reviews.Author: ideacatalyst
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, was a little apprehensive about the hotel after the negative reviews of a few guests here...however, remember the hotel has been recently renovated, so the rooms are very contemporary and stylish....booked for one night initially and then extended for the rest of the trip after seeing the place.

Reviews.Title: “First Awful Experiences stayed in so much hotel !!”
Reviews.Author: CDLEE63
Reviews.Content: My fiance and i were staying in other hotel and we decided to get a walk-in room in Concorde for a night due for the convenience after our pre-honeymoon party. My fiance had arrive without his ID or passport but fortunately i did have. The reception was holding us for 5 minutes and checking with the night DM about the registration from us with the absence of passport from my finace. After the 'MONKEY"way of discussion in front of us (which i do not think they should do it in front of the guest ), that is when the female night manager (Aliza or something, cant really remember the name ) approaching us with an arrogant face telling that its a rule and regulation to have both passport of ID to be present. I should have agree if she told me in a manner way, but along our conversation she was showing her rude tone and the way she looked at me was extremely disrespectful at all!! ( guess because i was wearing my party dress n ran to a hotel in the mid of the night? ). But is this how your staff treat the walk-in guest, or depend on what they wearing..?So i suggested that i would like to check-in first without my fiance since i have the ID and most important i was not feeling well ! And my fiance will pay for me everything before he going down to take his passport from our car as we had parked it quite far away. But the night DM was rejecting and said NO right away. Frankly, i was working in hotel industry before,and it is no way that there is no third party payment for the hotel room...its ridiculous. And i did told this lady and ensure that my fiance is not going to check-in till he got his passport back in a short while but i need to go in the room first as i did have my ID with me, and most important i was really not feeling well!! .What is wrong with this DUTY MANAGER?? All she did was with her sinister smile and said: NO. My fiance was very angry and i hold him back behind to comfort him, but just when we about to approach them again to compromise them, the night DM was raising her voice and yell: "hey, whatever u both discuss, i already know your motive, no matter what i need both your id TOGETHER and check-in TOGETHER !Or else, sorry !! ". OMG, is this how a manager rendered services or even solving a guest problem..??? I was quite shameful at that time as all the staff looking at us but this night DM just showing her SINISTER face and said.."I know your motive. so dont try to do anything". Dear night DM, my motive is to check-in first since i have my id and i am not feeling well, but my fiance will only check-in after he bring his ID from the car ! At last, i have to wait alone in the lobby for 15 minute for my fiance in order to get in to the room first. May i know what is the difference of me check-in first with my ID..?? We had pass a bad moment night,. It was awful and really unpleasant experience for the first time we travel so much. Never want to stay here again because of this so called "manager" !!

Reviews.Title: “3 nights weekend in Singapore...great hotel”
Reviews.Author: astiarjan
Reviews.Content: i stayed at Concorde hotel, Singapore for 3 nights (Nov 25 - 28 Nov 2011) for a family trip. The deluxe room is very spacious and bathroom is clean, too. Location is good, I could get around orchard road area at anytime I want to. there is a bus stop point in front of the hotel. But I have to remind those who hasn't stayed here before, thet the lobby is on 3rd Floor of the building, First 2 floors is food court and shops. Dont be surprised on 2nd floor there are some pubs and karaoke pubs which are a bit crowded during weekends. Luckily the noise isn't an issue. overall, the hotel worth the money we spent during our trip to Singapore. Will definitely recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not Concorde Hotel That I've Known,,”
Reviews.Author: ChloeJenna
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Concorde Hotel Singapore last May 2011, for my short transit in Singapore, before I continued to other places, and met my cousins and my partner who came down from KL and Bali. I decided to stay there, because I do really know the quality of Concorde, as we stayed sometime at some concorde hotels, and since I was traveling alone, I should stay somewhere that I could trust. Anyway, it came to my surprise that everything was not the same as I thought. The location of the hotel is quite shocky, as lots of little shops on the ground floor, and I had to pass by dark isle if I had to go out from the hotel to Orchard Rd. When I came, the reception, greeted and assisted by a very nice Japanese girl, very polite, however it took her ages to check me in. When I paid my deposit by cash, I made a mistake, because it took me longer than normal one. Since it seemed that she did not get use with the sequence or something, she asked her supervisor/manager (the man in the suit), to help, but it seemed that he was a bit "i am too busy - DND" I have noted that I requested for smoking room, then he rudely told me that, "i give you smoking room, but you have to smoke at the balcony" Well, I just ignored his arrogance, I just need to rest because I just had long flight. So, someone escorted me to the room, which is thousand miles from the elevator, exactly at the corner of the corridor. When I came inside, the room was old, and the balcony that he mentioned, was a dirty outdoor space, with a very "nice view" and not to mentioned a very tricky-almost impossible to open - sliding glass door. Again, I just ignored it. At the bath room, it was time to soak myself to the tub, but I cancelled that, since the tub look a bit moldy at the edge, and when I looked up the ceiling, it was rotten! Anyway, i had a great sleep, because I was super tired. At the breakfast, they were super extremely feeling busy, so, you may a bit invisible for them. The only two-thumbs-up that I should give was to the very super charming man, I guess he is the bell captain, who always assisted me with the taxi and last the luggage. He even selected me with a very "proper - looking - driver" since I was alone. Last but not least, the check out time, I had to (again) wait long because (again) there was unknown problem. However, I just pleased my self, because I could meet my cousins and partner after almost a year, and we were so happy to move to Sheraton Hotel. Anyway,,, That was not Concorde hotel I guess, the hotel that I have known for so long.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, spacious bedroom and bathroom”
Reviews.Author: yijing326
Reviews.Content: I was staying here for a night on 30th November. The room is spacious and clean. Just it is a bit inconvenience because you need to pass thru the rundown shopping mall before reaching hotel lobby. (Not sure there is any other entrance?) And there are some pubs/bars and massage shop in the shopping mall on the way back to lobby. A little worry if a girl walking there alone when going back. Overall it is great place to stay. Recommended this.

Reviews.Title: “very professional staffs”
Reviews.Author: Jakartan04
Reviews.Content: just transit for 1 night in singapore and i am happy with my hotel choice. still on orchard road, the hotel was very busy when i checked in but the staffs were very nice and professional. the room is really nice, but they need to upgrade the bathroom. the remaining area is superb. taxi can be a bit of problem if you are in a hurry, but you can always get the taxi from orchard road (not directly from the hotel lobby)

Reviews.Title: “Minimal fuss!!”
Reviews.Author: Zmaragdi
Reviews.Content: Arrived at hotel in the evening, our paperwork was ready. By the time we went to our room our luggage was there as well. Within an hour we had refreshed and were out dining!! Great location, close to public transport buses and subway. Room was very clean and was well set out. Breakfast was an amazing buffet set up and the waiters were very attentive. Would recommend this hotel to everyone and will be staying again. Value for money!!

Reviews.Title: “Well located quality hotel”
Reviews.Author: pbb451
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here many times. The hotel is of a high standard, the rooms are good and decorated tastefully, the restaurant offers good quality food to suit eastern and western palettes, and the staff are very professional. Beneath the hotel is a small shopping mall with a cheap food court, if you find the restaurant a bit heavy on the pocket. Being on Orchard road though, you are close to several large malls, and many restaurants and bars. Just a short walk down the road is Dhobi Ghaut metro station, from where you can reach anywhere in the city. There are also bus stops just outside the hotel. I keep coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: Animitra
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel. Has smoking rooms. Call them directly and see if you can get a better deal than what you can get from the internet. The Executive rooms come with breakfast and free internet. Downside is that the internet is limited to 1 MB.... Breakfast has a good spread. If you take the executive room, then you get to have breakfast in the Executive lounge in relative peace and quiet. Toilets are clean as are the sheets. The Air conditioning system is over enthusiastic. You'll need to get the reception to send someone to fix it for you so that you don't freeze. The hotel is on Orchard Road which means you are in the middle of shopping nirvana. There is a mall below the hotel should you not feel like stepping out. The entrance is very confusing. My transport from the airport dropped me in the basement which was a bummer considering the luggage I had. If you are traveling light, then it shouldn't be so much of a problem.

Reviews.Title: “Central and affordable”
Reviews.Author: ozziwanderer
Reviews.Content: Lovely hotel located close to popular shops. On the bus and short walk from mrt station. No complaints here!

Reviews.Title: “Great room, great location, great service”
Reviews.Author: Sleepykats
Reviews.Content: Pros: 1. Great location (near douby ghaut station which is a major interchange 2. Great room (premier suite has firm king bed, plush pillows, restroom is clean) 3. Great service (front staff is quite helpful and courteous) 4. Reasonable $ for room upgrade Cons: 1. Shops on the floors below the hotel (upon entering the hotel on orchard road, it seems that the hotel is tacky because of the shops below but the hotel is far from it)

Reviews.Title: “not what we expected”
Reviews.Author: Eileen B
Reviews.Content: This was the last hotel we booked for 2nights for final leg of our 5month trip. We had single beds, we booked as a couple, not happy. This was our splurge for trip, very unhappy with our stay. Not value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Regret my stay....Paid for a 4 star but got a 3 star service...”
Reviews.Author: ron1987413
Reviews.Content: Last....Will I stay there again....For 250 SGD no breakfast included/no internet and the incidents/events below....Never in my life again....STRICTLY AVOID!!! Lets start right from check in........ 1.Arrival at 2 pm:Room not ready at check in time got it at 2:30 when check in time being 2pm.Reception people rude type did not know how to smile.After a long flight one expects a room atleast at the designated time. 2.Room:Stain on bedsheet requested to change and had posted the bedsheet signage on the bed,but no one changed. 3.The doors chair showed old wear and tear.... 4.The gym was old and really need refurbishment...looked like a government gym 4.Getting back from orchard road shopping and dinner went through so called Concorde mall 2nd floor.At night it becomes a red light area where girls are loitering around the hotel yelling out at singles. 5.At checkout they wanted us to vacate rooms by 12pm right at checkout time whereas the check in time being 2pm got my room at 2:30pm. 6.Ordered few cappucinos at checkout as siiting in Lobby the stewrdess had same attitude as other staff members arrogant and rude. Last....Will I stay there again....For 250 SGD no breakfast included and the incidents below....Never in my life again....STRICTLY AVOID!!! The only good thing about place was location on Orchard location near Dhoby Ghaut MRT and plaza Singapura...

Reviews.Title: “Not value for money hotel”
Reviews.Author: kazama82
Reviews.Content: Very bad experience when staying at this hotel.firstly paying a premium hoping for a better service but no free wifi? The main reason I book this hotel because I found out that the provide wifi for my room. And to my surprise as well, for such a premium price, no breakfast serve!..the bathroom is dirty with plenty of unknown hair on the floor..better go for other hotel that its better than this

Reviews.Title: “Good location, but that's it”
Reviews.Author: sundboell
Reviews.Content: Pros - good location right on Orchard Road Cons - feels impersonal - no 'soul' - not really a view on anything - at least from 3rd floor

Reviews.Title: “good place not good view”
Reviews.Author: emmy_dian
Reviews.Content: not very good hotel.. i can't see anything except the room... there no view to see very' boring hotel

Reviews.Title: “Four Star Hotel but more like a 3 star”
Reviews.Author: jdavis2009
Reviews.Content: I was at this hotel for two nights on a business visit. The location is good but the service aspects can be improved. I had a so-called club room which did not feel like one. The club facilities are rather meager in relation to what you find in better hotels. Overall, not the most satisfying of experiences.

Reviews.Title: “Great place, we will stay there again”
Reviews.Author: CarinJapie
Reviews.Content: Centrally located, close enough to Somerset and Dhoby Ghaut MRT's, but walk to Dhoby Ghaut as it is a major interchange and can take you everywhere. Great room, great food, close to shops & transport. Have a reflexology at the guy downstairs at the hotel - it hurts but you'll feel great after an hour of recouperation! There were markets just down the street when we were there. Great! Highly recommended. They did however not want to accept a debit Visa as security, it had to be a credit card - luckily my sister had one as I only have a debit Visa. A must do in Singapore: Get food at Bread Talk - it is absolutely YUMMY!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: kevg_za
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel, but as all hotels nowadays, they use keycards. Just make sure that you open the door of the room when you leave, BEFORE removing the keycard, as the lights go out IMMEDIATELY. No delay. The 1st time this caught me off guard and I dropped the card. Had to fumble round in the dark to find it. The only other problem is that there is no direct street access to the lobby or room floors. One has to go through either the garage or shopping mall.

Reviews.Title: “Would definately stay again”
Reviews.Author: Malyboo
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Concorde for four nights in February 2011. Situated at the end of Orchard Road this hotel does not look very appealing but don't let that fool you. The rear of the hotel especially looks grim but thats just a cosmetic hicup. Inside the hotel it is very nice. Rooms are excellent and one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept in. The facilities are good and pool (we were the only people around it) is clean with poolside service for drinks and snacks. The only thing that lets hotels like this down is the cost of breakfasts. With such a choice just outside the hotel you would think they'd make meals a little more competative. Everything is close by and within walking distance if you want to. If you don't want to, taxis are cheap. We would definately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: BombshellT
Reviews.Content: Concorde Hotel is just a few minutes away from the malls of Orchard Road. Cabs are easy to get here so if you need to go to somewhere far, that won't be a problem. Rooms are clean and the lobby is a nice place to hangout and just lounge around after a tiring day of shopping. We love the glass elevators where you have a view of the lobby and other floors!

Reviews.Title: “Hard to fault”
Reviews.Author: Yeloc
Reviews.Content: Right up there as far as service & quality is concerned. We opted to pay a little extra and stay in a Club Room. Well worth the extra few $$'s for all the bonuses you get. Would like to see more and better quality bathroom linen. Staff, restaurant and all hotel facilities of very good standard - well done.

Reviews.Title: “Had several bad experiences . .wont be back ever”
Reviews.Author: Hima2009
Reviews.Content: We visited the hotel on 28th August 2010 and stayed for three days. The outlook was impressive with nice lobby and helpful staff.But when we checked in, the rooms we ordered were not available and what was immediately available were of a higher grade,expensive ones.I had to agree as we had a child who needed some sleep.We had to pay extra to checkin. A travel agent kept on troubling us using the in hotel intercom phones.His company was named Luxury Tours & Travel.The office was near the lobby. The agent who promised us a pickup vehicle at the airport,never turned up and was trying to pursue us into a travelers package,and called us to our room number several times. The room which was offered was having a ac leak.Water kept dribbling with thudding noises throughout the night.We were awake. when it came to breakfast, food was of very average quality.The same breakfast menu was offered for three days.And we were kept in a Que as the tables were full.we had to stand outside the restaurant. Overall i would not advice this place for any person.

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms...interesting location”
Reviews.Author: 777pj777
Reviews.Content: Great hotel in terms of the rooms..very comfortable bed - nicely furnished and clean. All staff are friendly and I would recommend this hotel, however I would add that the hotel is in a rather interesting location...plenty of less-salubrious bars / clubs dotted around the ground floor. This somewhat detracts from the rather nice lobby area. Unfortunate but not a deal-breaker...just be aware of it if you have young kids I guess...

Reviews.Title: “Very central and a lovely hotel to stay in.”
Reviews.Author: MarieAnnNZ
Reviews.Content: Our travel agent helped us choose this hotel. It's location in Orchard Rd was very good and we were delighted with the choice of accommodation seeing as we were going to be there for 10 nights. Breakfast was included in the price and what a fantastic breakfast too. We chose a "superior" room - not sure what the other rooms were like. I suppose one little nuisence!!. We arrived after a long flight from Auckland, very tired and when we approached the check-in desk we were confronted with options. i.e. if you pay this much more you will get this sort of room, and so on. The pictures of the rooms were put infront of us. Having booked a "superior" room all we wanted to do was get in and rest. That said we enjoyed our stay, the rooms were very comfortable, quite large and very clean. Everyone we came into contact with at the hotel were very pleasant. Staff were a credit to the organization.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location but ..”
Reviews.Author: magicpen
Reviews.Content: I went on business trip and chose concorde because of the location. The room looks modern but it failed to provide a good sleep. I could here the next room talking, bathroom was unclean and water from shower was on and off. I would expect this with the price I paid. There are message shops on the way to the street which looked a bit scary at night. If you choose the location, this hotel is good, only 5 mins to MRT and 10 mins walk to Orchard road. Next to the hotel as 24/7 food stall.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed Bag”
Reviews.Author: 1moretimetraveller
Reviews.Content: Stayed early July. We were a party of 12 (3 families) on a Singapore Stopover. Stayed for 2 nights. Overall hotel gives a good impression. I did not love the entrance to the hotel (through a very old shopping mall). Our rooms were lovely and spacious (hotel has been refurbished) but there is still room for improvement. Overall not a bad hotel, centrally situated to shopping - note however that it is at the end of the shopping part of the street on Orchard Road - but lots of nice malls on your doorstep.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: NJP1
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a great position on Orchard Road where all the best shops are and there plenty of places to eat nearby. I had a lovely room overlooking the swimming pool it was quiet with a good view of the park to the right. It is a bit confusing at first how to get out of the hotel onto the street but I soon got used to it. I enjoyed my stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Good position and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Gazza222
Reviews.Content: Basically most important thing rooms were clean, counter staff very friendly and helpful. Great location on Orchard road. Superb breakfast restaurant on ground floor. Lifts are a bit slow.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, Clean and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: BeardoAustralia
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 10 days and found the staff to be very friendly and accommodating. The bed was very comfortable and the room was a reasonable size. I was a bit disappointed that there was no free WiFi in our room and only one public computer in the foyer. At times the music from the downstairs nightclubs was loud. But the location was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Spot for Business and Shopping”
Reviews.Author: rest_relax_jakarta
Reviews.Content: Finding a good spot for a short business plus shopping trip in Singapore is quite tricky this day. I was very satisfied with the Concorde Hotel because not only of the location but with the new renovated rooms which made my stay more comfortable. Having read a good reviews of the hotel after the renovations I decided to book for 2 nites. The reviews mostly proofed to be true. Even though the lobby still looks quite old, but the room itself was clean and modern. It was not far from all the cafes, shopping malls etc. And the rate was good as well. We wil definitely recommend this hotel to our families and friends..

Reviews.Title: “Very good - worth the price”
Reviews.Author: DenimSneakers
Reviews.Content: I've stayed this hotel for a business related trip. At first, it seems un-convincing since you must go through an old shopping mall to access hotel lobby, but when you're in the lobby it's a whole different story. The room is very good and clean, there's an additional charge for in-room internet but the connection speed is worth the price. Hotel location is near Somerset and Orchard Rd around 5-10 mnts walk and I really enjoyed it since you could reach the entertainment and culinary center just on few steps. Hotel is also located between 2 MRT station so I didn't get any problem at all when transferring from/to airport. The most impressed experience that I had is the food. The breakfast is very good. I had couple lunches in the hotel restaurant where there was some themed food festival and I really had a good time with the selection of dishes.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel in the City Center”
Reviews.Author: M_K_SHARMA34
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel for ourbusiness stay in singapore mainly based on loaction & rating . The staff is social at just the right level and they go to great length to make you feel at home. While checkin they usually serve cold drindks , juices etc At no charge. The room we had was spacious and pretty, the breakfast is good and the distance to the city center & travelers attraction is limited. It’s a relaxing and quiet place – one where you really don’t mind spending an afternoon or two with a good book. And as many people have written before. Concorde is a place you would definitely come back to and recommend to your friends. Thank you very much for making our stay so pleasant!!!

Reviews.Title: “Don't even consider staying at Concorde: shocking overcharging”
Reviews.Author: LyonDublinVisitor
Reviews.Content: Booked a more expensive family room with agora.com. Was downgraded to a two person room. Didn't get an apology instead got hit with a 200 dollar surcharge for an extra bed for 3 night on checkout despite showing at both checkin and checkout that I booked and paid for 3 person room. Lots of other unexpected extra charges on bill. Very very unhappy.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic rooms and service”
Reviews.Author: BatyPerthWA
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed in a Premier Room for 10 nights. Could not have asked for more at an incredibly reasonable price (advance booking). Our arrival at 4am was not a drama and we were shown to the rooms (adjoining) and alseep within 20 minutes. The Premier room gives you access to the Premier Lounge - that alone was worth the money. A small dining room for breakfast - fabulous attentive service by David, Zee and Crystal - by the third day they had the tea and egg orders down pat. This dining rooms had the BEST bread and butter pudding I have ever had - better than the one at the Raffles! The best part was the happy hour from 6-8pm daily - spirits wine and champers plus yummy snack food - you could easily skip dinner after this! During the day the lounge is available for tea coffee and soft drinks - fabulous idea! The Premier rooms were very large with comfy beds, super comfy sofas and a good work area. Love the long balconies too. The complimentary laundry service (2pieces per room per day) was so handy for getting pants etc clean. Room service was prompt and delicious. Also one morning before leaving for the day we managed to pull a handle out of the tiles in the bathroom. Being in a hurry we left if on the floor to deal with on our return. When we got back the handle had been replaced - obviously picked up by the room attendants - good job! Pool area is large and clean - we are quick to bring you a towel and offer you a drink as well. This hotel is about 300m from Doby Ghaut station and Plaza Singapura - which makes it central to everything! Underneath is a food hall that sells the yummiest asian food for the princely sum of $3.50 - sing dollars. Also close by is Starbucks and so many other shops. Fabulous place to stay - big clean functional rooms at a reasonable price - we will be back very soon!!!

Reviews.Title: “Typical hotel in the centre of Town”
Reviews.Author: mikriviglahotel
Reviews.Content: A typical 4 stars hotel that you can start your trip around Singapore...

Reviews.Title: “Like it enough to go back”
Reviews.Author: chinggu
Reviews.Content: Just come back from 3nights staying in Concorde. In my opinion all hotel review should consider depends on the price you pay and the expectation n service the hotel provide. I got SGD 245/night nett, include breakfast which I found okay since Singapore hotel is way overprice. Location wise, Concorde is just 3minutes walking to plaza singapura, theater n shopping n Dhobi ghout mrt, if you want to go to the other end of orchard like takashimaya, paragon, ion just hop in the mrt n hop out at orchard station since walking especially with children is quite far. I just love the location. It is also in front of kpo great beer! The hotel has not ages despots of it's long time history, but room are just nice n clean. Bathtub a lil old, shower hard, room are big, beds are big, nice beds.. Sleep very well. Staff: Lisa- wan were very kind n helpful, but other especially the morning- afternoon staff look stressful. Breakfast menu n taste was not special, but the attitude of the staff made me stop coming after day 1. They were grumpy and look at your table with some insulting manner. I did complained since they really made me lost appetite. Well don't worry, down stair in basement they have lovely food court with awesome e food and very cheap. Also outside the hotel there are food stalls with even more delicious food open since morning to midnight. If it's not enough just walk 3minutes to plaza singapura on the left or 3 minutes walking then cross the street for food republic. In summary, as long as you get good price on this hotel, take it. We will comeback for the right price!

Reviews.Title: “great hotel the location is amazing”
Reviews.Author: becstaCanberra
Reviews.Content: we stayed at this hotel because of the location. when we got there they said that the room that we had booked [ a premier room] had been recently refurbished but all they did was was put new carpet in a two peaces of new furniture, they did not paint it or any thing, it looked nothing like the other rooms and we where still paying the same rate. and being on the 4th floor all we could here was doof doof music coming from the night club zone across the street all night and we did not get any sleep that night. so the next day we arked if we could be moved to a new room [on the 7th floor] and they said that we could and when we got there it was so much better the room really did look like it had up dated and it was really what it looked like in the photos and that night we did not here any music and the rest of the stay was very good. the gym was really good and so the pool even though it was bacic and the buffet breaky was really good and the stuff always remembed who you where and what your needs where.

Reviews.Title: “Very poor customer service!!!”
Reviews.Author: lalainep
Reviews.Content: We waited for hours to get our rooms and we could not have gotten them if we had not patiently followed up evry 15 mins. The reception had the guts to raise her voice at us everytime we ask about the room. Super frustrating! The next day, we expected our room to be cleaned when we returned in the afternoon but LO and BEHOLD, it was still the same used towels, beddings and all when we returned. Turned out that there was only one housekeeper and she cant cope with the load. Worst of all, there was no electric power in our bathroom and when we requested for somebody to fix it, it took them 2 hours to send somebody. The whole experience was a nightmare!!! Dont ever stay at this hotel, you will regret it!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great hotel *****”
Reviews.Author: Ginny1962
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel based on the reviews on Tripadvisor and we were not disappointed. Great location, lovely hotel. We had a deluxe room, very spacious, internet was included plus breakfast, which was a buffet style and if you left hungry, that was your own fault. Friendly staff and great service. Might be a little confusing as Orchard Rd is through the back of the hotel, but once you work it out, it is easy.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: wijayabura
Reviews.Content: Stayed with family on holiday. Lovely hotel with access to most shopping malls. Good and friendly staff. Good tour operator in the hotel. Expensive Internet access had to use cyber cafe at the mall within the complex. Had one ugly incident, power in the room went out for almost one hour other than that it was an enjoyable stay at the hotel

Reviews.Title: “the honeymooner special”
Reviews.Author: vishal_dr_sharma
Reviews.Content: One of the good luxury hotel and can be rated as number one................what a way these people fetch you from the airport........with a chouffer driven Merc and both the driver and the navigator are females................lovely breakfast and wine bottle on arrival......... The way people think they serve you accordingly.............

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: trip4u2
Reviews.Content: We were quiet happy with the Concord Hotel. As mentioned in almost all the reviews, the location can't be beat. Easy access to various means of public transportation. Front desk very helpful. The standard deluxe room we stayed in was very nice, clean, quiet, and overlooked Orchard Rd. No complaints. The pool area on top was also very nice. They had a computer available for free use by the reception area. Many restaurants and shopping malls within a short walk from hotel. Can't really think of any negative issues. One thing that was unusual was the front enterance off of Orchard Rd. You enter into a shopping area and need to take the elevator up a couple floors to reach the lobby. Not a Four Seasons or Ritz Carlton by any means but great value for what you get.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: malupit
Reviews.Content: The Concorde Hotel is located in the shopping district of Orchard Road, and has a bus stop directly in front of it and an MRT station a 5 minute walk away. Bell service and concierge service were excellent and non-intrusive; there was a bit of a hard sell at the front desk for an upgrade to our booking, but it was graciously accepted after a polite no that we weren't interested. The room was clean and large, with a safe, LCD TV with cable, and a tub in the bathroom. Despite being in a room directly facing the busy Orchard Road, they had excellent soundproofing and the traffic/vehicular noise did not bother us. They provided free water, although the mini-bar was surprisingly empty. There was no free wi-fi access in the rooms or even in the lobby of the hotel, which in this day and age is a bummer. Do check their online rates, since it was through their website that I got pretty good deal. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and would gladly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Central location, good value for money”
Reviews.Author: bookworm0759
Reviews.Content: The Concorde is centrally located on Orchard Road. There is a bus stop directly in front of it and a train station within a few minutes walking distance. The tourist information centre is also nearby and it is right in the heart of the shopping district. On arrival we were met with a welcome drink and as our Deluxe room was not ready we were upgraded to a Premier room. The main advantage to this was that it included free internet. Internet access is available at a cost and there is a Guest Lounge in the lobby which also gave access if staying in a deluxe room. We had breakfast daily in the hotel restaurant and the wait staff were very attentive. There was an interesting blend of western and asian food but was plentiful. Overall, the staff were all very helpful. The hotel corridors looked a bit tired but the room was clean and comfortable. Sometimes the room was not serviced until quite late in the afternoon but we were usually out most of the day so it was not a big problem.

Reviews.Title: “I would go back because of its great location!”
Reviews.Author: greekcypriot2009
Reviews.Content: We spent 3 nights at Concorde Hotel with my husband on a package trip we had, flying along with other 50 people. I guess the travel agency picked this hotel as it is very centrally located. Orchard Road is considered to be the best shopping area in Singapore. It is very close to the International Airport, and the fact hat the train station is around the corner makes it even more popular. Of course the hotel is beautiful,…formerly it used to be the Le Meridien Hotel by the way! The staff at the reception was quite friendly and helpful, and our room and bathroom was comfortable and clean. Breakfast was ok I can say, but to be honest I expected to have a bigger variety. I grade it with -8. The internet was a bit expensive, but I did not use it for too long. There was a nice gym room but then again unfortunately we did not have time to visit it. Most of our time there was spent outside sight-seeing or shopping, although I should admit that Singapore is considered to be an expensive country!! In all, I would return to this hotel again mostly because of its great locati

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel - Excellent Executive Lounge”
Reviews.Author: linmikga
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Concorde Hotel for 4 nights in February 2011. We took the train from Changi Airport and got off at the Dhoby Ghant Station about two blocks from the hotel. Tickets were 1.90 Singapore dollars with a $1 deposit for the transit card. One of the train employees helped us with the deposit refund and then showed us where the hotel was. We had pre-booked the hotel on an extraordinary rate for an executive suite and lounge privileges. Faridah checked us in at the Executive Lounge and was gracious and helpful throughout our stay. We also received exemplary assistance from Fernando. Both hosts in the Executive Lounge were kind and courteous throughout our stay. Any other employees we had contact with were also very helpful. Faridah and Fernando gave us recommendations on where to go and how to get there on public transit or walking. At check-in our rate was confirmed and we were first assigned room 421. It was dark and was next to the pool. We requested a room change and were immediately moved to room 664. It was a much more pleasant room overlooking Orchard Road. The room included both a tub and separate shower. The toiletries were very nice with shampoo, conditioner, toothbrushes and toothpaste, lotion and razors. The linens were very nice and the rooms cleaned early each day. The lounge provided breakfast with hot and cold choices and a cook to order station. In the evening there were cocktails, wine and beer with canapés. We also had two pieces of laundry included in our rate. With the heat and humidity in Singapore that was a very welcomed amenity. The hotel is located between two train stations and an easy walk down Orchard Road between the two. There are lots of shopping malls and dining options in this area. We bought a 3-day tourist card for $34 (including a $10 refundable deposit for the card). The tourist card allowed unlimited train and bus access for the MRT. From the time we arrived at the hotel at reception and were directed to the Executive Lounge we were treated well. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: CAG63
Reviews.Content: This is a great location at the bottom end of Orchard Road. Only a couple of minutes walk from Somerset MRT. Some great eateries within a few minutes walk and good shopping. There is an internet cafe on the shopping floor which was much cheaper than the hotel. Staff are extremely friendly and room service was efficient. Really pleased with the free bottles of water everyday. The only problem was the noise from one of the downstairs clubs that we could hear around 5 a.m. (but I am a very light sleeper). We will definitely stay here again for the sheer convenience.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel - very convenient”
Reviews.Author: MelbourneMaxxy
Reviews.Content: Spent three nights in an Executive Club Room. Great Surprise when upgraded to a Suite room which was more like a Studio than a regular Suite,but very nice. Cab driver had no trouble finding hotel and we were really pleased with the location. Agreed the walk through the mostly deserted shopping centre to gain entry from Orchid Road was a bit strange but was no real issue for us. All of the staff from the beginning to the end of our visit were friendly and couldn't do enough for us, Would ceretaInly recomend paying a bit extra if you can for executive club privelidges. Beakfast, light morning/afternoon tea and evening coktails with lots of nice hot and cold nibblies. A lovely haven when returning from sightseeing. We have allready booked to stay here again when we go back to Singapore in September. Would certainly reccomend and we got a really good discount for booking really early!

Reviews.Title: “Nicely tucked away even in the most happening place”
Reviews.Author: Ayeshafarzana
Reviews.Content: I was overjoyed to find out that the hotel was located a minute away from this huge 3 storey Forever 21 shop!!! Very conveniently located on Orchard Rd. Staff was very friendly. Super clean room and baths. Great breakfast spread too. Just wish they had free wi-fi instead of having to plug in through cable to enjoy the free internet!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location but the Deluxe Rooms are in Dire Need of Refurbishment”
Reviews.Author: iSino88
Reviews.Content: When Concorde took over the hotel from Le Meridien, they did not re-renovate the Deluxe Room, much to my dismay. It is still exactly the same room as it was during Le Meridien's days. My room was located on the 4th floor and the carpet in the walkways smelled. Anyway, the room was clean and the breakfast was just okay. I just hope the management would seriously consider to refurbish their Deluxe Rooms. I would still go back to this hotel provided the price is right.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you Concorde Singapore”
Reviews.Content: Thank you to all of the wonderful team at the Concorde hotel Singapore,particularly all the hosts in the Premier lounge who made my families stay so enjoyable.. From comfortable clean rooms and good food to the cordial hotel staff I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough ....all complimented by a great location on Orchard Road within a few minutes of the MRT station at Dhoby Ghaut.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: rohannathan
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Concorde hotel in early March this year for 3 nights. I found the location being on Orchard rd to be very convenient. Shops and places to eat are located close by as is public transport (MRT and buses). The hotel also had a gym which i used and had good range of machines/weights. The rooms were clean and well maintained and the tv had a good choice of channels. Would definitely stay here again. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful especially in organising transport via the $9 shuttle bus back to the airport. The hotel also had a tour desk which conveniently organises tours around Singapore which picks you up and drops you back at the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed Feelings”
Reviews.Author: SVIJANY
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel for a night as a stopover from Australia. Reception staff member on duty was a little cold to start with and it took some time to get checked in, even though I had given exactly the same details at the booking office at Singapore airport. 40 minutes wait with two phone calls to reception for my luggage to arrive and yet the hotel seemed very quiet. I booked a deluxe (?) room, above the normal standard anyway. The room was a reasonably good size with all the normal equipment and comforts that a 4 star hotel should offer. Cleanlness was of a good standard in the room, even the aircon/extraction vents looked clean which is often overlooked by cleaning staff and management alike. The room looked out onto the hotel pool which I didn't use, but it looked perfectly adequate and clean. Balcony was dirty and hadn't been cleaned for a long time. The flower/plant beds which are part of the balcony wall, could do with livening up with a bit of colour and cigarette ends should be removed. The bed was was very comfortable, possibly one of the most comfortable I have slept in for a very long time. 2 bottles of complimentary water were a refreshing change to the often extortionate price that hotels charge. Free standard tea and coffee was also a nice touch. The bathroom was simply unacceptable. It was very small, there was rust around the vanity mirror and mould all around the bath wall. The sealant between the bath and wall had been renewed several times in places (Message to the management .Next time a bath is leaking into the room below, remove all of the sealant and start again, don't patch it up. It looks visually bad and is a waste of time). The mould also (obviously) makes the bathroom smell. The extraction fan was broken, which, once repaired, must surely be the best remedy for a mouldy bathroom. Breakfast was acceptable with a constant supply of coffee and tea being offered by pleasant waiting staff and a charming breakfast chef, who took time to explain some of the dishes aswell as asking how I was enjoying my stay (reception staff take note regarding customer interaction) The concierge service was adequate, if a little vague at times, but pleasant at the same time. I managed to get more information from the enthusiastic bellboy.Shame about the delay in luggage delivery and collection. Location was excellent. Someone was moaning about a lack of access to Orchard road on one of the earlier posts. Take the lift from the reception, cross the corridor at the bottom and you are on Orchard road. Can't see what this person meant in their post. Would I stay here again ? Yes I would, but I'd want a look at the bathroom first.....

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommended”
Reviews.Author: Xotica123
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I arrived at about 9 am. We were given welcome refreshing drinks and allowed to check in to our non-smoking room on 4th floor straightaway. First night no problems. From 2nd night onwards in the evenings strong smell of cigarette smoke from bathroom permeating into bedroom; also guests with young kids running amok morning and night. After 3 nights we were offered alternative room; upgraded to Premier room on 9th Floor. Only downside is access to Orchard Road is a bit a of a hassle in having to go down one floor. Overall it was a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great for Orchard Road shopping”
Reviews.Author: Gwyndolen
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 2 nights as part of a tour en route to Australia. Hotel was clean (room had recently been refurbished) and the bed was very comfortable. We could not lock our room safe so called reception. They quickly sent someone who showed us how it worked which was different to the instructions posted on the safe! The location is great for the shopping in Orchard Road although you have to navigate your way through the hotel's shopping arcade which is desperately in need of updating. We had the buffet breakfast in the hotel's Spices restaurant (SGD25 each plus taxes) which was excellent. Good choice of Western and Asian food and excellent service.

Reviews.Title: “Long way to Go”
Reviews.Author: Rafflesia
Reviews.Content: Likes about the hotel Stayed at the executive room in January. Was told that the premier and executive rooms had just undergone a facelift which was great. Could tell that lots of care and effort was put into it resulting in nice comfy rooms. Another strong point of the hotel is the quality of service provided by staff that had been working in the hotel a long time. All the staff who borthered to chat with me were from people serving at the bell, in the restaurant etc had worked in the hotel there since the Le Meridian days. These individuals made me feel welcomed and were genuinely interested in how my day in Singapore went. Dislikes Staff maning the reception was cold. After making eye contact with me and after I had informed him I was checking in, the next word he uttered was passport. Not attempt at small talk, no asking how my flight was, no asking if i needed help with my luggage. Could tell from his tone and body language that I was another customer he had to serve which he wanted to get through ASAP. (I was the only customer checking in at that time) Noticed that the premier lounge was located at the ground level. If i was a guest at the premier floor, would have hated going all the way to the ground level to access the lounge As already mentioned by other guest, there is no direct access to orchard road. Hotel guest will have to meander through a shopping complex to gain access to Orchard road. Bottomline While the management has done well in upgrading facilities, more needs to be done in terms of training for its younger staff. Another challenge is to also retain the services of its more mature workforce.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: markjackson100
Reviews.Content: I was surprised about the few negative reviews about this hotel because I was inpressed with just about every aspect from the moment we checked in until the moment we left. We were there for four nights over new years 2010 and had a great time. We'd paid for a suite, which was really just a bigger room, and as a result we were given access to the Executive Lounge. This meant a complimentary bar between 5.30 and 8.00pm each afternoon and a buffet breakfast in the club lounge.
